result.title: Script for Converting Polygon ZIPs to Domjudge ZIPs
result.content: So, at times we need to host our contests on Domjudge. But we like to create the problems on Polygon, and it is a pain to port Polygon packages to Domjudge zips. Here is a small script that does the above. It currently just fixes test-data and some problem properties, but can be improved to do many more things.
